channel.title: Question
channel.description: I have been developing a server for a little bit now, and I understand most, I am quite familiar with multiple languages so I'm not a newb. I was just wondering if someone could explain to me the "Drop Type", what is the difference between the types?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Oh well here’s all you need to know on how to make drops…

I will use an icewarrior for example.

Open Item3.java and scroll to the very bottom and right after the second last } press enter and add this

public static int ICE[] = {Drop Id's here}; public static int randomICE) { return ICE[(int)(Math.random()*ICE.length)]; }

Then open up your Npchandler.Java and search for

Item2.randomKBD()

Next Add This Right After The ///}:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 125) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomICE(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

So it would look like this

//if(NPCID2 == 200) // this is index number in autospawn cfg, not actual npc id, if using more than 1 of the desired npc use more than one index - cheez //{ //ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); //} if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 125) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomICE(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

To Change Drops You Would Edit The Numbers From The item3.java at the bottom:

public static int ICE[] = {Drop Id's here};

And Also The More The Number The More Common It Drops. The Less Its a More Rare Drop.

To Change The Monster You Would Edit the The Id From This:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 125)

I used testscape/cheezscape for this tut but im sure it is easily compatible with any other source.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 16, 2006, 11:37:18 AM[/size][hr]I took that from my own Drops Tut here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Go check it out if you want

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Runedeadly:

I have been developing a server for a little bit now, and I understand most, I am quite familiar with multiple languages so I’m not a newb. I was just wondering if someone could explain to me the “Drop Type”, what is the difference between the types?

Yes, do NOT change drop types and I am guessing you are trying to add drops in Drops.CFG thats is not how you add drops. Which source are you using?

Read full topic
